member.name: T:HidDisplay.DefaultPlugins.WindowsMousePlugin
member.summary: Plugin wrapper to listen for mouse events.
member.remarks: Instead of immediately forwarding every mousemovement, this accumulates events for a set period of time the forwards the sum of the movements.

member.name: M:HidDisplay.DefaultPlugins.WindowsMousePlugin.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:HidDisplay.DefaultPlugins.WindowsMousePlugin.MouseMoveUpdateIntervalMs
member.summary: Gets or sets how long to accumulate move events before updating the ui.

member.summary: Translate button state from hardware watch to plugin event format.

member.summary: Translate scroll state from hardware watch to plugin event format.

member.name: M:HidDisplay.DefaultPlugins.WindowsMousePlugin.InputEventMapper(System.Object,BurnsBac.WindowsHardware.HardwareWatch.MouseChangeEventArgs)
member.summary: Accepts hardware mouse events. Button and scroll events are forwarded immediately. Movement events are added to the accumulator to be forwarded later.

member.summary: Forwards sum of movements to app for display.
